I think you'll find it boring.\""},{"lineNumber":12994,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほう。俺を遠ざけたいって事は","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh? Let's begin.\""},{"lineNumber":13003,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う……うん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"U... okay...\""},{"lineNumber":13004,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おいこら、答えんかーーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, answer me!!!\""},{"lineNumber":13005,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まるで違う。なっておらん。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's completely wrong. It's not right.\""},{"lineNumber":13006,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もっと雷を練るのだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Knead the thunder more.\""},{"lineNumber":13007,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ね、練るって言われても……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"K-Knead it...? Even if you say that...!\""},{"lineNumber":13008,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そして、奴らの気持ちを知れ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"And know their feelings.\""},{"lineNumber":13009,"originalJapaneseLine":"　誼-ﾖｼﾐ-を通じて、行き先を導いてやるのだ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Through goodwill, guide the destination!\""},{"lineNumber":13010,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わ、分かるように言ってよぉ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"P-Please say it so I can understand!\""},{"lineNumber":13011,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔法学の、どの方程式を参考にとか……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Like, which magic theory equation should I refer to...!\""},{"lineNumber":13012,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あんなものは子供に教える初歩に過ぎん。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Those are mere basics taught to children.\""},{"lineNumber":13013,"originalJapaneseLine":"　言語化した時点で真理は劣化する」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Once put into words, the truth deteriorates.\""},{"lineNumber":13014,"originalJapaneseLine":"「魔力では嬢ちゃんが上なのだぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"In magical power, young lady, you are above me.\""},{"lineNumber":13015,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なぜ押し込めぬか、肌で感じろ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Why not unleash it? Feel it with your skin!\""},{"lineNumber":13016,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う、うわぁぁぁぁん！　言葉が通じない！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"U-uaaah! Words don't get through!\""},{"lineNumber":13017,"originalJapaneseLine":"「スパルタ……っつうか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Spartan... or rather...\""},{"lineNumber":13018,"originalJapaneseLine":"「感覚派だったのか、カバッハーン老……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"He was a man of intuition, Old Kabahaan...\""},{"lineNumber":13019,"originalJapaneseLine":"驚くギャラリーの前で、","translatedEnglishLine":"In front of the surprised gallery,"},{"lineNumber":13020,"originalJapaneseLine":"カバッハーンはひたすらマジックをしごいていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Kabahaan was diligently honing his magic."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ジジイなんぞ、好かれるわけないな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There's no way an old geezer like that would be liked."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん……お主もまた雷が欲しいのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph... You want the thunder too?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「要らんわ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't need it!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いやあ、そうでもないんだぜ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, that's not quite it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「むっ、キザ野郎」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph, you flashy guy."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どうも、雷帝。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hello, Thunder Emperor."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これから教導ですか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Are you going to give instruction now?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うむ……向こうが時間を作れると言うからな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes... they said they could make time."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「で、何がそうでもないんだ、キザ野郎」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So, what do you mean by 'not quite it,' flashy guy?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これでカバッハーン老は慕われてるのさ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "With this, Old Kabahaan is actually admired."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 厳しいが的確で公正な方だからな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He's strict, but accurate and fair."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔法学校の教師でもあるから、直接の弟子も多い」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He's also a teacher at the magic school, so he has many direct disciples."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……サイアス。余計な事は言うな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Saias. Don't say unnecessary things."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おっと。総統閣下に実情を正しく把握して頂くのは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oops. I thought it would be beneficial for the Supreme Leader to understand the situation correctly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 有益だと思いまして」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I believe it's helpful."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「このジジイが教師だと？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This old man is a teacher?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 生徒をばんばん黒コゲにしてそうだが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He seems like he would scorch the students black and blue..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺は教えを受けた訳じゃないがね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I haven't been taught by him, though."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんでも生徒のレベルに合わせた教え方を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Apparently, he thoroughly adjusts his teaching method to the student's level."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 徹底しているそうだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's what I've heard."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん……田舎で隠棲でもする方が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph... I'd rather live in seclusion in the countryside."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 性に合うのだがな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It suits my nature better."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとなく三人で歩いた先、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Somehow, after the three of them walked along,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一つの扉でカバッハーンは歩みを止めた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kabahaan stopped in front of a door.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ここだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Here."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ん？　この部屋は……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm? This room is..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はぁ……来たわね、カバッハーン老。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Haa... you've come, Old Kabahaan."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さあ……って、ランス？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well then... Lance?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おお。何だお前、ジジイの弟子なのか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh. What, you're the old man's disciple?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんな付きっきりで師弟やってる訳じゃないわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's not like we're a constant master-disciple pair."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たまに教わってる、んだけど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I just get taught once in a while..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まさか、見ていく気なの？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You don't mean to watch, do you?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その……退屈だと思うわよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well... I think you'll find it boring."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほう。俺を遠ざけたいって事は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh? You want to keep me away, huh?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 恥ずかしい目に遭うって事か」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That means I'll see something embarrassing."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なっ……そ、そんなことないわよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wha... that's not true!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おいクソジジイ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, damn old man."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 教師ヅラしてエロい事してるんじゃないだろうな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Don't tell me you're doing pervy stuff pretending to be a teacher."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックは俺のだぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That magic belongs to me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ば、馬鹿な事言ってないで！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "D-Don't say foolish things!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カバッハーン将軍がそんな事する訳ないでしょ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There's no way General Kabahaan would do such a thing!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ギャラリーは放っておけ。やるぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ignore the onlookers. Let's begin."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おいこら、答えんかーーー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, answer me!!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まるで違う。なっておらん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's completely wrong. It's not right."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もっと雷を練るのだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Knead the thunder more."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ね、練るって言われても……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "K-Knead it...? Even if you say that...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そして、奴らの気持ちを知れ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "And know their feelings."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誼-ﾖｼﾐ-を通じて、行き先を導いてやるのだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Through goodwill, guide the destination!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わ、分かるように言ってよぉ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "P-Please say it so I can understand!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔法学の、どの方程式を参考にとか……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Like, which magic theory equation should I refer to...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あんなものは子供に教える初歩に過ぎん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Those are mere basics taught to children."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 言語化した時点で真理は劣化する」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Once put into words, the truth deteriorates."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔力では嬢ちゃんが上なのだぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "In magical power, young lady, you are above me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なぜ押し込めぬか、肌で感じろ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Why not unleash it? Feel it with your skin!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「う、うわぁぁぁぁん！　言葉が通じない！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "U-uaaah! Words don't get through!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「スパルタ……っつうか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Spartan... or rather..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「感覚派だったのか、カバッハーン老……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He was a man of intuition, Old Kabahaan..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 驚くギャラリーの前で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In front of the surprised gallery,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カバッハーンはひたすらマジックをしごいていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kabahaan was diligently honing his magic.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

Feel it with your skin!\""},{"lineNumber":13016,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う、うわぁぁぁぁん！　言葉が通じない！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"U-uaaah! Words don't get through!\""},{"lineNumber":13017,"originalJapaneseLine":"「スパルタ……っつうか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Spartan... or rather...\""},{"lineNumber":13018,"originalJapaneseLine":"「感覚派だったのか、カバッハーン老……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"He was a man of intuition, Old Kabahaan...\""},{"lineNumber":13019,"originalJapaneseLine":"驚くギャラリーの前で、","translatedEnglishLine":"In front of the surprised gallery,"},{"lineNumber":13020,"originalJapaneseLine":"カバッハーンはひたすらマジックをしごいていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Kabahaan was diligently honing his magic."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ジジイなんぞ、好かれるわけないな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There's no way an old geezer like that would be liked."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん……お主もまた雷が欲しいのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph... You want the thunder too?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「要らんわ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't need it!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いやあ、そうでもないんだぜ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, that's not quite it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「むっ、キザ野郎」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph, you flashy guy."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どうも、雷帝。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hello, Thunder Emperor."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これから教導ですか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Are you going to give instruction now?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うむ……向こうが時間を作れると言うからな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes... they said they could make time."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「で、何がそうでもないんだ、キザ野郎」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So, what do you mean by 'not quite it,' flashy guy?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これでカバッハーン老は慕われてるのさ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "With this, Old Kabahaan is actually admired."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 厳しいが的確で公正な方だからな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He's strict, but accurate and fair."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔法学校の教師でもあるから、直接の弟子も多い」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He's also a teacher at the magic school, so he has many direct disciples."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……サイアス。余計な事は言うな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Saias. Don't say unnecessary things."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おっと。総統閣下に実情を正しく把握して頂くのは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oops. I thought it would be beneficial for the Supreme Leader to understand the situation correctly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 有益だと思いまして」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I believe it's helpful."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「このジジイが教師だと？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This old man is a teacher?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 生徒をばんばん黒コゲにしてそうだが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He seems like he would scorch the students black and blue..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺は教えを受けた訳じゃないがね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I haven't been taught by him, though."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんでも生徒のレベルに合わせた教え方を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Apparently, he thoroughly adjusts his teaching method to the student's level."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 徹底しているそうだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's what I've heard."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん……田舎で隠棲でもする方が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph... I'd rather live in seclusion in the countryside."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 性に合うのだがな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It suits my nature better."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとなく三人で歩いた先、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Somehow, after the three of them walked along,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一つの扉でカバッハーンは歩みを止めた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kabahaan stopped in front of a door.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ここだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Here."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ん？　この部屋は……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm? This room is..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はぁ……来たわね、カバッハーン老。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Haa... you've come, Old Kabahaan."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さあ……って、ランス？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well then... Lance?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おお。何だお前、ジジイの弟子なのか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh. What, you're the old man's disciple?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんな付きっきりで師弟やってる訳じゃないわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's not like we're a constant master-disciple pair."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たまに教わってる、んだけど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I just get taught once in a while..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まさか、見ていく気なの？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You don't mean to watch, do you?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その……退屈だと思うわよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well... I think you'll find it boring."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほう。俺を遠ざけたいって事は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh? You want to keep me away, huh?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 恥ずかしい目に遭うって事か」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That means I'll see something embarrassing."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なっ……そ、そんなことないわよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wha... that's not true!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おいクソジジイ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, damn old man."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 教師ヅラしてエロい事してるんじゃないだろうな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Don't tell me you're doing pervy stuff pretending to be a teacher."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックは俺のだぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That magic belongs to me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ば、馬鹿な事言ってないで！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "D-Don't say foolish things!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カバッハーン将軍がそんな事する訳ないでしょ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There's no way General Kabahaan would do such a thing!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ギャラリーは放っておけ。やるぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ignore the onlookers. Let's begin."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おいこら、答えんかーーー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, answer me!!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まるで違う。なっておらん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's completely wrong. It's not right."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もっと雷を練るのだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Knead the thunder more."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ね、練るって言われても……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "K-Knead it...? Even if you say that...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そして、奴らの気持ちを知れ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "And know their feelings."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誼-ﾖｼﾐ-を通じて、行き先を導いてやるのだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Through goodwill, guide the destination!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わ、分かるように言ってよぉ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "P-Please say it so I can understand!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔法学の、どの方程式を参考にとか……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Like, which magic theory equation should I refer to...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あんなものは子供に教える初歩に過ぎん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Those are mere basics taught to children."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 言語化した時点で真理は劣化する」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Once put into words, the truth deteriorates."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔力では嬢ちゃんが上なのだぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "In magical power, young lady, you are above me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なぜ押し込めぬか、肌で感じろ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Why not unleash it? Feel it with your skin!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「う、うわぁぁぁぁん！　言葉が通じない！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "U-uaaah! Words don't get through!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「スパルタ……っつうか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Spartan... or rather..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「感覚派だったのか、カバッハーン老……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He was a man of intuition, Old Kabahaan..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 驚くギャラリーの前で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In front of the surprised gallery,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カバッハーンはひたすらマジックをしごいていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kabahaan was diligently honing his magic.
